snippet: Comcast, which acquired 51 percent of NBCUniversal from General Electric in 2011, is now buying the rest for $16.7 billion, Brian Stelter reports on Media Decoder.
abstract: Comcast, which acquired 51 percent of NBCUniversal from General Electric in 2011, is now buying the rest for $16.7 billion, Brian Stelter reports on Media Decoder.
